caption: Databucket
description: The databucket object represents a databucket is a basic container that holds data, typically organized through the use of data partitions.
name: databucket

created_time.description: The time when the databucket was known to have been created.

modified_time.description: The most recent detection time of the activity or object. See specific usage.

size.description: The size of data bucket, in bytes.

groups.description: The group names to which the databucket belongs.

type_uid.description: The normalized identifier of the databucket type.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the databucket.
